channel.title: distill on Alison Hill
channel.description: Recent content in distill on Alison Hill

item.title: M-F-E-O: postcards + distill
item.description: The new postcards package and distill are M-F-E-O (made for each other). Here is a brief walk-through to add a postcards personal profile page to your distill website or blog, using only R Markdown.

item.title: Teaching in Production
item.description: A 2-hour workshop for RStudio certified trainers on how to make shareable slides and websites with R Markdown.
